more_information.en:
Sure, I can provide more information about Investify:

Well, *Investify* is Pakistanâ€™s Most Popular App for Pakistan Stock Exchange ğŸ‡µğŸ‡°

The main purpose of this app is to provide information related to Pakistani stocks, their real-time prices, volume and other live data on the PSX. You can make your virtual portfolio in the app that allows you to track the Profit & Loss of your real portfolio. This means you can use Investify for demo or practice trading as well.

*Important:*
Please note, you *can not do real trading* on Investify. To trade, purchase and sell shares with real money on the PSX, you will have to open an account with a PSX broker instead. If you want an official list of brokers provided by the Pakistan Stock Exchange, reply to us by typing *broker* and we will share the list.

*Video on How to Use Investify:*
If you want to see a good video on how to use Investify app, then watch the following video on YouTube:
https://youtu.be/9auoyYoYLX4

*List of Investify Features:*
- Live Data on KSE100 and all companies
- Graphs for price and volume for all companies up to 5 years back
- Virtual Portfolio with Sell and Dividends History
- Personalized Watchlist
- Latest Business News in Reader Mode
- Regular Market, Portfolio and News Update Notifications
- Fundamentals and Technicals of All Companies
- Full Company Profiles
- Company Announcements on PSX
- Sort and Screen stocks by volume, gainers, losers and price
- And much moreâ€¦

*Learn More About Stocks and Trading:*
If you are new to stocks and trading and want to learn how to trade in PSX then please go to YouTube and search with the following search terms:
- 'Learn PSX'
- 'Stock Beginner Course'
- 'Pakistan Stock Market Course'
- 'Stock Fundamental Analysis PSX'
- 'Stock Technical Analysis PSX'
There are a number of free courses available on YouTube and the internet as well.

If you have any other questions regarding the Investify app, please ask us and we will get back to you. If you want to stop receiving messages from us, please let us know.

reset_password.en:
If your Investify account already exists and you want to reset your password, follow these steps:

1. Open the Investify App and on the first screen tap the *Forgot your password* text
2. On the Forgot Password screen, enter your Email and press *Submit*
3. You will receive an email with a 6-digit verification code. Open this email and note the code
4. Return to the app, enter the 6-digit code, and press *Verify Code*
5. A *Choose New Password* screen appears. Enter the new password, then re-enter the same password in *Confirm Password*, and tap *Reset Password*
6. A success message will appear. Now log in with your new password

broker_information.en:
I am sending you an *official list of brokers* with whom you can open a real trading account and then buy and sell stocks on the Pakistan Stock Exchange. All brokers in the list are those which allow online account opening, so you do not have to go to their office physically to open the account.

As an Investify support team member, I cannot recommend any specific broker. However, the list I am providing is also available on the official PSX website and all brokers in the list are active according to PSX. You will have to research yourself and then choose a broker to open the account with.

Every broker has their own requirements, documentation, and commission structure. You will have to contact the broker yourself and ask them about it. The list has phone numbers, websites, and email addresses of each broker. My advice is to send an email to multiple brokers and ask them their requirements and fees structure. In the email, also give your phone number and hopefully, someone from the brokerâ€™s sales team will call you directly.

Just to remind you again: Investify app is only an information and portfolio tracking app for the Pakistan Stock Exchange. You cannot do real buy or sell on Investify and will have to open an account with a real broker to trade. Investify does not accept any cash deposit from anyone as it is not a real broker.

not_for_trading.en:
Investify is *not a trading app* and you *cannot buy or sell real shares* with Investify.

Please note we do not take any deposit in any condition and therefore, there is no withdrawal process.

The portfolio in Investify app is only a virtual portfolio which can be used for tracking your real portfolio or for practicing to trade.

To trade, purchase and sell shares with real money on the PSX, you will have to open an account with a PSX broker instead. If you want an official list of brokers provided by the Pakistan Stock Exchange, reply to us by typing *broker* and we will share the list.

If you want more information about Investify, please send us *info* or *information* in reply and I will share more information about Investify in response.

account_creation.en:
Are you having any issues in creating an account? It is very easy to create an account in Investify.

Please follow these steps:
1. Go to the first screen of the app and tap the button *Create Account*
2. Enter your email address, then enter new password two times. The new password has to be at least 8 characters. Make sure the â€˜Confirm passwordâ€™ is the same as â€˜Passwordâ€™. Then press the *Sign Up* button.
3. If registration is successful, there will be a message in green which says â€˜Account created successfullyâ€™ and you will be taken to the Login screen automatically.
4. Now your email and password will be already entered, so just press the button to *Sign In*.
5. You will now be logged in and you will see the main News screen.

If you face any error in the above process then please send us a message with a screenshot of the error. If you want more information about Investify then reply with *info* to this message.

multiple_portfolio.en:
Currently, it is not possible to add more than one portfolio in Investify. We are working on this feature and InshaAllah in the future you will be able to add multiple portfolios.

It is not possible to give an exact timeframe on when this feature will be available, but please know that this feature is in our roadmap.

Thank you for being a valuable user of Investify.

subscription_payment.en:
Subscriptions can only be bought through Google Play (Android) or the Apple App Store (iOS). Their policies donâ€™t allow any other payment route.

Use any debit card like EasyPaisa Debit Card, a bank debit card, etc. inside the relevant store. Your card details never reach Investify; Google or Apple process them securely.

adblock_private_dns.en:
Thanks for reaching out. This issue is usually caused by Private DNS or an ad-blocking app on your phone/network.

Please try these steps:
1. Open phone Settings
2. Go to Network / Connections
3. Open Private DNS
4. Set it to Off (or Automatic)

Also disable any ad-blocking apps/services temporarily (for example: AdGuard, NextDNS, Blokada, DNS filter apps, Pi-hole, 1.1.1.1 DNS filter mode), then reopen Investify and try again.

If the issue remains, share a screenshot and your device model so we can help further.
